title: dear adc mains
body:
pls understand that ADCs have a broken late game, any adc played above diamond will be an absolute monster late game and the game becomes 4 meatsihelds+adc vs 4 meatshields + adc, im not saying this is a bad thing because they keep tanks and bruisers in check, but u cant really expect ur class to be good early, mid, AND late game, if u want adcs to be strong mid game u need to realise that ur late game need to get gutted heavily

so please just farm untill 3 items then kill that 6 items tank within 3 seconds without even getting a pen item ^_^
